import React from'react';import{Box,Grid,Card,CardContent,CardMedia,Typography,useTheme}from'@mui/material';import intuitiveImage from'../../images/intuitive.png';import flexibleImage from'../../images/flexible.png';import powerfulImage from'../../images/powerful.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const featuresData=[{title:'Intuitive',description:'An easy-to-use interface that allows you to quickly create games with no code.',imageUrl:intuitiveImage},{title:'Flexible',description:'Supports a wide variety of game types, allowing you to bring your ideas to life.',imageUrl:flexibleImage},{title:'Powerful',description:'Capable of handling complex projects and delivering impressive results.',imageUrl:powerfulImage}];const FeaturesSection=()=>{const theme=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{flexGrow:1,mt:8,bgcolor:theme.palette.background.default},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h2",textAlign:"center",gutterBottom:true,children:"Key Features"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:2,justifyContent:"center",children:featuresData.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{sx:{maxWidth:256,m:'auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",height:"256",image:feature.imageUrl,alt:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{gutterBottom:true,variant:"h5",component:"div",children:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",children:feature.description})]})]})},index))})]});};export default FeaturesSection;
